Posts.Content: Hi i had a mascectomy and dope as well also skin graft as had skin failure on breast my stomach is still numb and my stomach scar is far higher Thani thought it would be my belly button is off centre I had my op back on jan although some days I feel hideous as now having chemo as well I am thankful to still be here you just have to take each day as it comes try to think of something positive each day or set yourself a goal I know it's easy for me to say this but the emotional swings are part and parcel of it your personality is what shines through not your breasts or your belly people should support you for who you are a survivor x
Posts.Title: masectomy and reconstruction
